data.title: Sharon Hiley's Reviews on Artfinder
data.meta_description: Sharon Hiley's shop reviews on Artfinder, the global marketplace for independent artists.

Rosemary Chillcott, United Kingdom

Review posted 30 Aug 2019

I am thrilled with my hedgehog. It is even prettier in real life. I love the colours Sharon has used. Hedgehog is like a little ball of sunshine and I love it. Sharon is a delight to liaise with and I will treasure this item in my home. Many thanks Sharon xx

Response from Sharon Hiley

30 Aug 2019

Thank you for your lovely review Rosemary. I'm so glad this expressive little creature has found a loving home with you.

Sonia Alani, United Kingdom

Review posted 25 Apr 2018

Really loved this mini-artwork, though I hadn't checked the dimensions on the listing, so it was a bit of a surprise when it arrived and was so small. However, once framed just as shown on Artfinder, it looks fabulous and the colours are beautifully vibrant - a real feeling of summer joy and sunshine!

Response from Sharon Hiley

26 Oct 2018

Oh no! It is a tiny piece but I'm glad you are happy with it regardless of size!

Sonia Alani, United Kingdom

Review posted 25 Apr 2018

Having just purchased 'Springtract' from Sharon Hiley, I also had my eye on this print of hers, as it reminded me of my treasured Pascal Mourgue 'Les Oiseaux' jug and I just couldn't resist. It arrived beautifully packed with lovely hand-written and decorated labels. Really pleased with the way it now looks framed, and hung behind my bird collection.

Response from Sharon Hiley

26 Oct 2018

Thank you so much for your reviews. I have just looked up the jug you refer to and I can see the connection! You sound to have a beautiful collection of work. I bet your house looks amazing!

Jeanine Cuje-Bartsch, Germany

Overall rating

Seller communication

Delivery and packaging

Listing accuracy

20 Nov 2017

Could not be happier. Item is wonderful in every way. Nice communication with Sharon. The item was very well wrapped. Fast shipping. Highly recommend her artwork!

Response from Sharon Hiley

20 Nov 2017

Dear Jeanine, Thank you for your glowing review. I am so glad you are completely happy with your order it means a lot to know you love something that I have created and packaged with love! Kind Regards Sharon
